attributes.action: Introduce the application of Anti terrorist Laws to deal with  Drug dealing and Drug possesion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the United Kingdom there is a growing epidemic of drug dealing and  drug use. Vast sums of money from these drug sales is going directly to fund terrorist groups and actions particularly in Iran and Iraq. Our soilders serving abroad are being attacked and killed by insurrgent groups (ie Al Qaeda) funded by drug trafficking in the United Kingdom. We the undersigned request that anti-terrorist laws be applied or adapted to apply to the elimination of the scourge of drug dealing in the United Kingdom.
